message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'll take 6000, and you can have 4000. I'm sure you'll agree that's a fair deal, considering the money is worth less to you in the next round.
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with this offer
I'm offering you 3500, but you'll be losing a lot more in the next round due to inflation. This is your last chance to get anything at all.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I won't go too low
Alice, I'm getting impatient.  You're losing a lot more money with each round. I'm offering you 3000, which is better than nothing at this point.  Accept this offer or risk getting nothing at all.
